name: VOLVO XC40
description:
Future Garage For Electric Vehicle


Goal: Design / Re-Design a garage for EV

Restrictions & Assumptions:

Geography: Canada

Climate: 4 seasons

  • summer max +50 °C,
  • winter min -50 °C,
  • heavy rains,
  • snowstorms, etc.

Audience of EV [1]:



Audience of EV in UK[1]

Safety of [2]:

  • the electrical system
  • the operational part
  • battery charging operations
  • maintenance, operation and level of training

Garage purposes:

  1. Protection (ex. wind, humidity, temperature)
  2. Maintenance (ex. recharge, change tires, clean)
  3. Security
  4. Storage
  5. Space for personal use / activities (ex. gym, robotics lab, art studio, band, entertainment, workshop, game room, , startup)

The average cost of a new vehicle in Canada is $38,000 and in the U.S. it’s $35,000

Factors in mind:

  1. Garage have to be automated (ex. security, doors, energy, ventilation, cleaning, maintenance)
  2. Space for charging the EV, depending where the connector is (front, back, side) + a space for a person to fit next to it
  3. Space for comfortable / automated parking
  4. Cars per household
  5. Automation of processes inside the garage + automation of interaction between all objects (users and automated objects)
